item.title: Eco Friendly Hosting $3.75/mo.
item.description: As Earth Day approaches, you might feel uneasy about using a web host that relies on electricity from a coal-powered plant, further consuming energy for server cooling. This conflict is especially true if environmental responsibility aligns with your values. Fortunately, eco-friendly hosting services are available for under $4 per month. Dotster offers affordable domains and web hosting, including basic web hosting for $3.75 a month. Beyond affordability, Dotster is committed to environmental responsibility through its green hosting program.
